header: Is America’s Approach to Health Broken?
subheader: Yes – and we have a plan to make America healthier.
body: In some ways, our country’s health care is the envy of the world, but in others, it’s failing. Too many people living in America aren’t as healthy as they could be because the system isn’t working for them. That’s why the AAMC (Association of American Medical Colleges) developed a bold new plan to create a healthier future for all.
